attributes.action: Tell people the truth about this petitions website
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Mr Prime Mininster. Please tell people the truth about this petitions website in that it’s quite useless and nothing more than an online slush pile to ease the snail mail petitions coming through your door and blocking up the hall. A bit like the Harper Collins Authonomy website. Do you think the people are stupid or something?

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
